title: Schedule a Home Visit for a Case
description: A social worker needs to schedule a required monthly home visit with a client.

tasks.description: Identify the client and their case.
tasks.expected_outcome: The worker pulls up the correct case file.

tasks.description: Contact the client to coordinate a suitable date and time for the visit.
tasks.expected_outcome: The worker and client agree on a time for the home visit.

tasks.description: Schedule the visit in the case management system and the worker's calendar.
tasks.expected_outcome: The worker successfully books the appointment in the system.
